Posts.Content: That’s good to know. Fortunately, the Keytruda is working so I don’t need to seek out care in Mexico. Take care, Randie
Posts.Title: Summit PERSONALIZED CANCER VACCINES for immunotherapy Aug 27-31, Boston.

Posts.Content: Thank you, Fightterm, for posting this. I’ve been interested in vaccines for a long time and was considering going to a clinic in Mexico that creates a vaccine using dentric cells. Fortunately, I was able to try Keytruda and thank G-d it’s working. But I do think vaccines could lead to a cure. :) Randie
